songwriters.name: Celine Dion
songwriters.biography: Celine Dion was born on March 30, 1968, in Charlemagne, Québec, a little town 50 kilometers from Montréal. She was the 14th child of Thérèse Tanguay and Adhémar Dion. The Dion family was a humble one of modest means, but never lacked for love. The house was jam-packed with children, and Celine mom even had to lay her littlest one to sleep in a drawer.

songwriters.name: Ligitas Kernagis
songwriters.biography: 1981 m. baigė Jonavos 1-ąją vidurinę mokyklą, įstojo į Kauno politechnikos instituto dabartinis KTU, Elektrotechnikos fakultetą. 1986 m. jį baigė ir įgijo inžinieriaus-energetiko specialybę.
